original_text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast, and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward;
korean_text: 천사들을 통하여 하신 말씀이 견고하게 되어 모든 범죄함과 순종하지 아니한 자들이 공정한 보응을 받았거든

sentences.original_text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 천사들이 전한 말씀이 굳건하게 섰고,

sentences.original_text: received a just recompence of reward;
sentences.korean_translation: 공로에 대한 마땅한 보응을 받았기 때문이라
